item.title: Install PHPServerMon on Ubuntu with PHP-FPM, nginx, MySQL
item.description: Install requirements Install git: sudo apt install git -y Install PHP 7.4 sudo apt-get install software-properties-common sudo add-apt-repository ppa:ondrej/php sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y php7.4 Install NginX sudo apt-get install nginx -y
